data.title: Welcome to Legal Aid Services of Oklahoma's guide to free legal help in Oklahoma.
data.meta_description: Legal Aid Services of Oklahoma has free legal information on Oklahoma law, self-help court forms, court information and other helpful resources.
data.text:
Below is a list of consumer reporting companies – companies that collect information and provide reports on consumers that are used to decide whether to provide consumers credit, insurance, or employment, and for other purposes. There are a lot of "specialty reporting companies" that focus on certain industries.

This list doesn’t cover every company in the industry. It’s a list of companies that have identified themselves as consumer reporting companies or provide consumers access to their consumer reports. The list includes both the biggest nationwide credit reporting companies and a longer list of “specialty reporting companies.”

The list includes information about how you can obtain copies of your reports. In addition to the information below about when you can get a free copy of your report, under federal law all consumer reporting companies must provide you with a copy of your report for a reasonable fee (the current maximum is $11.50). You can recieve credit reports from Experian, TransUnion, and Equifax one a year for free. Go to AnnualCreditReport.com to get your free report.

This information comes from the Consumer Finance Protection Bureau (www.consumerfinance.gov)

This list includes entities that have identified themselves as consumer reporting companies or particular types of consumer reporting companies or have indicated when they provide consumers access to their consumer reports. The list incorporates information from the companies’ own self-descriptions that has not been independently verified by the Bureau. It was not intended by the Bureau to be an all-inclusive list, nor does it reflect any determinations by the Bureau as to whether any particular entity is or is not subject to the Fair Credit Reporting Act or any part thereof or complying with it. Furthermore, presence on or absence from the list does not indicate whether the consumer reporting company is subject to the CFPB’s supervisory authority.

To see a particular specialty, click on the name or scroll down the page [top]

National Credit Reporting Companies

Check Screening/Check History

Payday Lending

Auto and Property Insurance History Reports

Supplementary/Alternative Credit Reports

Utilities

Rental

Medical

Employment History Reports

NATIONAL CREDIT REPORTING COMPANIES

Equifax

Equifax is one of the largest nationwide providers of credit reports. Its reports contain:

Information about your payment history (submitted by credit card companies, mortgage lenders, auto financers and other creditors nationwide).

How much credit you have.

How much credit you use.

Information from debt collectors.

Public information, like bankruptcies, liens and judgments.

The company will provide one free credit report every 12 months.

The company will also provide a free report if an adverse action is taken against you based on information in your report or under other specific circumstances.

Website: http://www.AnnualCreditReport.com

Mailing address:

Annual Credit Report Request Service

P.O. Box 105281

Atlanta, GA 30348-5281

877-322-8228

Experian

Experian is one of the largest nationwide providers of credit reports. Its reports contain:

Information about your payment history (submitted by credit card companies, mortgage lenders, auto financers and other creditors nationwide).

How much credit you have.

How much credit you use.

Information from debt collectors.

Public information, like bankruptcies, liens and judgments.

The company will provide one free credit report every 12 months.

The company will also provide a free report if an adverse action is taken against you based on information in your report or under other specific circumstances.

Website: http://www.AnnualCreditReport.com

Mailing Address

Annual Credit Report Request Service

P.O. Box 105281

Atlanta, GA 30348-5281

877-322-8228

TransUnion

TransUnion is one of the largest nationwide providers of credit reports. Its reports contain:

Information about your payment history (submitted by credit card companies, mortgage lenders, auto financers and other creditors nationwide)

How much credit you have.

How much credit you use.

Information from debt collectors.

Public information, like bankruptcies, liens and judgments.

The company will provide one free credit report every 12 months.

The company will also provide a free report if an adverse action is taken against you based on information in your report or under other specific circumstances

Website: http://www.AnnualCreditReport.com

Mailing Address

Annual Credit Report Request Service

P.O. Box 105281

Atlanta, GA 30348-5281

877-322-8228

CHECK SCREENING/CHECK HISTORY

Certegy Check Services

Collects check writing histories and provides check screening services for retailers who accept checks as payment in their stores.

The company will provide one free report every 12 months.

The company will also provide a free report if an adverse action is taken against you based on information in your report or under other specific circumstances.

Website: http://www.AskCertegy.com

Mailing Address

Certegy Check Services Inc.

P.O. Box 30296

Tampa, FL 33630-3296

866-543-6315

Chex Systems

Collects checking account applications, openings, and closures, including reasons for account closure. When you apply for a new checking account many banks and credit unions will refer to this database before they approve the new account.

The company will provide one free report every 12 months.

The company will also provide a free report if an adverse action is taken against you based on information in your report or under other specific circumstances.

Website: http://www.ConsumerDebit.com

Mailing Address

Chex Systems Inc.

Attn: Consumer Relations

7805 Hudson Road, Suite 100

Woodbury, MA 55125

800-428-9623

Early Warning Services

Checking account information.

Negative information for financial institution employees.

The company will provide one free report every 12 months.

The company will also provide a free report if an adverse action is taken against you based on information in your report or under other specific circumstances.

Website: http://www.EarlyWarning.com

Mailing Address

Early Warning Services

16552 North 90th Street, Suite 100

Scottsdale, AZ 85260

800-325-7775

Telecheck

Provides information on check fraud and conducts check verifications for retailers who accept checks as payment in their stores.

The company will provide one free report every 12 months.

The company will also provide a free report if an adverse action is taken against you based on information in your report or under other specific circumstances.

Website: http://www.FirstData.com/telecheck

Telecheck

P.O Box 4514

Houston, TX 77210-4514

back to top

Clarity Services

325 E. Warm Springs Road, Suite 202

Las Vegas, NV 89119

The company will provide a free report if an adverse action is taken against you based on information in your report or under other specific circumstances.

Website: http://www.FactorTrust.com

Mailing Address

Factor Trust

The company will provide a free report if an adverse action is taken against you based on information in your report or under other specific circumstances.

Kennesaw, GA 30160

877-772-2123 (Option 1)

Teletrack

Teletrack information sources include payday advance businesses, rent-to-own businesses, furniture stores that offer financing, auto finance companies, high-risk consumer finance businesses, non-prime mortgage businesses, non-prime credit card issuers, credit unions, and cable/telecom companies.

These types of lenders will often refer to this database to when considering whether to extend new credit.

The company will provide a free report if an adverse action is taken against you based on information in your report or under other specific circumstances.

Website: http://www.Teletrack.com

Mailing Address

Teletrack

Attn: Customer Service

5550-A Peachtree Parkway, Suite 600 Norcross, GA 30092

877-309-5226

iiX

SUPPLEMENTARY/ALTERNATIVE CREDIT REPORTS

The company will provide one free report every 12 months.

The company will also provide a free report if an adverse action is taken against you based on information in your report or under other specific circumstances.
